en-AU.summary: Discover feeds about machine learning and store these feeds on Arweave's network blockchain.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask machine learning vocabulary for a term
Alexa tell machine learning vocabulary to tell me trivia
en-AU.name: Machine Learning Vocabulary
en-AU.description:
Ask for machine learning feeds and vocabulary, and learn and discover terms and definitions about machine learning. All the feeds you listen to are stored on Arweave's network blockchain. Machine learning feeds and vocabulary provides fun and education the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch machine learning vocabulary" or "Alexa, open machine learning vocabulary" to get a term or feed.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
